<div className="content-holder ">

  <div className="col-40">
    ### Introduction to Low-Fidelity Wireframes The following low-fidelity
    wireframes are an early representation of our website’s design, focusing on
    layout and functionality rather than detailed aesthetics.
  </div>

  <div className="col-40">
    These wireframes serve as a blueprint for the user interface, outlining the
    core structure and primary elements required to meet user needs and business
    goals.
  </div>

  <div className="col-40">
    Our goal with these wireframes is to ensure that the fundamental components
    of the website are arranged logically and intuitively, facilitating easy
    navigation and a seamless user experience.
  </div>

  <div className="col-40">
    By focusing on functionality, we can identify potential issues early in the
    design process and iterate accordingly. These wireframes will guide us in
    developing a user-friendly interface that meets our users' needs
    effectively.
  </div>

  <div className="col-40">
    Feedback at this stage is crucial as it will help us refine our design
    before moving on to high-fidelity prototypes and final visual designs.
  </div>

    <div className="col-40">
   #### Key Points:
   <br/>
   - **Purpose:** To establish a clear layout and functional blueprint for the website.
   - **User-Centric:** Designed to prioritize user needs and ease of navigation.
   - **Iterative:** Part of a flexible design process that will evolve based on feedback.
   - **Scope** Focused on functionality, not final visuals.
  </div>
</div>

<PageCover id="lowFiWireframe"
  title="Header Component Structure"
  subtitle="Low Fi Wireframe"
  description={
     <ul>
      <li>
        <span>Primary Navigation:</span>
       Simplified access to major categories including Buy, Rent, and Off-plan, allowing users to filter properties based on their specific requirements.
      </li>
      <li>
        <span>Primary Search Panel:</span>
        Includes Location, Property Type, Beds/Baths, and Price to facilitate quick property searches.
      </li>
      <li>
        <span>Advanced Filter Options:</span>
         Provides additional criteria for refined search results without overwhelming the user.
      </li>
         <li>
        <span>Bookmark Functionality: </span>
        Allows users to save properties for later review, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.
      </li>
    </ul>
  }
